BOARDS.NO_BOARDS: Oops, you don't have boards yet

WELCOME.TMINE: Task Manager by Inga, Nastassia, Ed
WELCOME.TITLE: Create issues, break them into tasks, track relationships, add custom fields, and have conversations. Visualize large projects as spreadsheets or boards, and automate everything with code.
WELCOME.ABOUT_WORK: About working on the TMINE project:
WELCOME.NASTASSIA_TASK2: Writing a service with API requests
WELCOME.NASTASSIA_TASK4: Welcome and Edit Profile User Interface
WELCOME.ED_TASK1: UI of login page, main page and board page
WELCOME.ED_TASK4: Implementation of drag-n-drop functionality for tasks and columns
WELCOME.EXTRA2: Participate in the discussion, control the execution of tasks. All this is free in TMINE mobile application.
WELCOME.EXTRA4: At the moment the application is developed in two languages: Russian and English. You can switch the language in the header.
WELCOME.EXTRA6: You can use the app in day or night mode. You can switch the mode in the header
WELCOME.EXTRA8: If you have any questions or suggestions about the application, you can contact the developers. Contact details are above.
WELCOME.EXTRA10: TMINE is convenient to use for both small teams and large companies. Its capabilities are suitable for all business sectors.
WELCOME.EXTRA12: TMINE is designed with an adaptive layout, which allows you to use it on any device (mobile phones, tablets, laptops and computers). Minimum page width - 320px.
